Chapter 16: Custom Rules

The following rules cover a variety of circumstances that might arise when you run a session or campaign of ACKS.

# Chapter 16: Custom Rules

The following rules cover a variety of circumstances that might arise when you run a session or campaign of ***ACKS****.*
